title: Karaoke Web Standard
body: Provides semantic language processing for two-way communication with a remote host. This new interface creates a system-to-system forced sonic recognition on the receiving party.

comments.body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lD9FAOPBiDk
"IE introduces new Karaoke web standard" - you told this in 2012, today it's still "Under Consideration". You can't even lie well.
